text: André Ducharme (born 23 July 1961) is a Québécois author, comedian and humorist. He was part of the Rock et Belles Oreilles group (RBO) from 1981 to 1995. He was credited as André G. Ducharme in RBO; "G. Ducharme" has the same sound in French as "J'ai du charme," which means "I have charm" or "I am charming." ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:French Quebecers Category:Comedians from Quebec Category:Canadian male television actors Category:Male actors from Quebec Category:Canadian sketch comedians
title: André Ducharme
